name: BreakOut with Waves
description:
Instructions:
Hit the green blocks.  Avoid the red spikey ball.

Controls:

Press mouse to start.
Escape to quit
Move mouse left and right to move your paddle.
 

Inspired by: 
Make a 2D Arcade Game in a Weekend
https://www.amazon.ca/Make-2D-Arcade-Game-Weekend/dp/1484214951

and

Juice it or lose it - a talk by Martin Jonasson & Petri Purho

This is a 2D brick breaking game made during a "Waves" themed Game Jam.

Game Engine: Unity
Programming:  RoncinGames
Art: game-icons.net
Music: kevin McCloud https://incompetech.com/  "Cephalopod"
Sound generated in Bfxr  https://www.bfxr.net/

Updated 20230227 to deal with win/loss blocking player.
